DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate administration corifollitropin alfa day 7 instead day 5 pre-treatment oral contraceptive pill result reduce total rFSH ( recombinant follicle stimulate hormone ) consumption GnRH antagonist protocol donor .
DOC.brief_title: Corifollitropin Alfa D5 Versus D7 After Contraceptive Pill
DOC.criteria: Women 1835 old , regular spontaneous menstrual cycle 2530 day length Who vaginal sexual intercourse inconvenient vaginal exploration Donors can´t 6 child ( neither donation ) Not adopt born gamete donation pregnancy BMI 1828 kg/m2 Height > 1.55cm Gynecological general examination Pap smear , HIV , HCV ( hepatitis C virus ) , HBV ( hepatitis B virus ) RPR ( rapid plasma reagin test ) negative serology , normal karyotype No abnormal Psychological profile Discard disease : blood disorder , neurodegenerative/psychiatric disease , Fragile X Syndrome , cystic fibrosis carrier , oncology disease .
